name: BlobFish-ing
description:
BlobFish-ing is a game where you have to go fishing and pay your rent!

Made during the SIA Summer Core Class intensive!

Catch fish at the docks, walk to the shop to sell your fish or buy upgrades, and go to your house to pay your rent! If you don't pay the rent before the 10th of the month every month, you lose! Instructions are in the game.

To restart the game if you lose, please refresh the page :)

This game is in development/is a prototype. Please report any bugs to me!
